name: Astraeus (itch)
description: Help design and drive a rover that will be launched to an exoplanet! The planet of Astraeus is a mysterious mars-like world with thundering sand mountains, huge snow fields, and lush plains with alien life. Start in the Vehicle Assembly Building [VAB] and build your idle rover to be launched and used for tough and exciting missions and challenges. Good luck out there and happy exploring!
